agents.name: WF4 - Reviewer & Learner Agent
functions: Read and analyze completed tasks from calendar history
Use AI (Gemini) to analyze performance patterns
Store refined rules in Notion database

agents.name: WF1 - Collector Agent
functions: Monitor Google Calendar for new events
Fetch weather data from OpenWeatherMap API
Read existing tasks from Notion database
Use AI (Gemini) to parse and structure data
Provide clean data feed to Planner Agent

agents.name: WF2 - Planner Agent (The Brain)
functions: Use AI for re-planning and conflict resolution
Adaptive decision-making based on learned rules

agents.name: WF3 - Executor Agent
functions: Update task status in Notion database
Send plan summaries via Telegram bot

core_technologies: Google Gemini API - AI processing and decision making
Notion API - Task and rule storage
Telegram Bot API - Notifications and alerts
